fetchCourses(String, String) - Static method in class org.academics.dal.dbStudent
Returns a ResultSet object that contains the course codes, course names, and grades for the courses that a particular student has enrolled in up to the current semester.

fetchGrades(String, String) - Static method in class org.academics.dal.dbStudent
